LanguageData.GraftBlood.label: Anti-infestation system
LanguageData.GraftBlood.description: A system that contains a set of drugs aimed at suppressing pathogenic bacteria or fungi, eliminating infection
LanguageData.pillsCommonCold.label: Cold tablets
LanguageData.pillsCommonCold.description: Tablets for colds do not eliminate the influence of the virus, but significantly delay its development, suppressing symptoms by -25% of the progress of the disease (maybe even working).
LanguageData.pillsMalari.label: Malaria tablets
LanguageData.pillsMalari.description: Tablets for malaria do not eliminate the influence of the virus, but significantly delay its development, suppressing symptoms by -25% of the progress of the disease (maybe even working).
LanguageData.pillsFlu.label: Flu pills
LanguageData.pillsFlu.description: Flu tablets do not eliminate the influence of the virus, but significantly delay its development, suppressing symptoms by -25% of the progress of the disease (I hope that it is effective).
LanguageData.pillsPlague.label: Plague tablets
LanguageData.pillsPlague.description: Anti-plague tablets do not eliminate the influence of the virus, but significantly delay its development, suppressing symptoms by -25% of the progress of the disease (the expiration date is almost expired).
LanguageData.pillsSleepingSickness.label: Sleeping sickness pills
LanguageData.pillsSleepingSickness.description: Tablets for sleeping sickness do not eliminate the influence of the virus, but significantly delay its development by suppressing symptoms -25% of the progress of the disease (caffeine and adrenaline, they will definitely not let you sleep).
LanguageData.pillsCoronavirus.label: Coronavirus tablets
LanguageData.pillsCoronavirus.description: Tablets for Coronovirus do not eliminate the influence of the virus, but significantly delay its development, suppressing symptoms -25% of the progress of the disease (Contains up to 10% nanobots).
LanguageData.pillsEbola.label: Ebola pills
LanguageData.pillsEbola.description: Ebola pills do not eliminate the influence of the virus, but significantly delay its development, suppressing symptoms by -25% of the progress of the disease (where did you find that?).
LanguageData.pillsMeasles.label: Tablets for measles
LanguageData.pillsMeasles.description: Tablets for measles do not eliminate the influence of the virus, but significantly delay its development, suppressing symptoms by -25% of the progress of the disease (this is treatable, right?).
LanguageData.pillsPneumonia.label: Tablets for Pneumonia
LanguageData.pillsPneumonia.description: Pills for Pneumonia do not eliminate the influence of the virus, but significantly delay its development, suppressing symptoms by -25% of the progress of the disease (it’s safe, right?).
LanguageData.primitivepillsCommonCold.label: Cold Potion
LanguageData.primitivepillsCommonCold.description: A potion for colds does not eliminate the influence of the virus, but significantly delays its development, suppressing symptoms - 15% of the progress of the disease (maybe even working).

LanguageData.primitivepillsFlu.description: The flu potion does not eliminate the influence of the virus, but significantly delays its development by suppressing symptoms -15% of the progress of the disease (I hope it is effective).
LanguageData.primitivepillsPlague.label: Plague Potion
LanguageData.primitivepillsPlague.description: The plague potion does not eliminate the influence of the virus, but significantly delays its development, suppressing the symptoms -15% of the progress of the disease (the expiration date is almost expired).

LanguageData.primitivepillsSleepingSickness.descripti: A potion for sleeping sickness, does not eliminate the influence of the virus, but significantly delays its development by suppressing symptoms -15% of the progress of the disease (caffeine and adrenaline, they will definitely not let you sleep).

LanguageData.primitivepillsMeasles.description: The potion for Measles does not eliminate the influence of the virus, but significantly delays its development, suppressing symptoms by -15% of the progress of the disease (this can be treated, right?).
